name: OpenAI
semantic_context: Message an assistant or GPT, analyze images, generate audio, etc.
natural_language_description: 这是 OpenAI 节点。主要用于: Message an assistant or GPT, analyze images, generate audio, etc.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: text

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: message
available_options: Message a Model (值: message) - Create a completion with GPT 3, 4, etc.
Classify Text for Violations (值: classify) - Check whether content complies with usage policies

modelId.name: modelId
modelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the assistant. The maximum length is 256 characters.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the assistant. The maximum length is 256 characters. | (必填项)

description.name: description
description.description: The description of the assistant. The maximum length is 512 characters.
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: The description of the assistant. The maximum length is 512 characters.

instructions.name: instructions
instructions.description: The system instructions that the assistant uses. The maximum length is 32768 characters.
instructions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Instructions | 作用: The system instructions that the assistant uses. The maximum length is 32768 characters.

codeInterpreter.name: codeInterpreter
codeInterpreter.description: Whether to enable the code interpreter that allows the assistants to write and run Python code in a sandboxed execution environment, find more here
codeInterpreter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Code Interpreter | 作用: Whether to enable the code interpreter that allows the assistants to write and run Python code in a sandboxed execution environment, find more here | 默认值: False

knowledgeRetrieval.name: knowledgeRetrieval
knowledgeRetrieval.description: Whether to augments the assistant with knowledge from outside its model, such as proprietary product information or documents, find more here
knowledgeRetrieval.natural_language_description: 参数名: Knowledge Retrieval | 作用: Whether to augments the assistant with knowledge from outside its model, such as proprietary product information or documents, find more here | 默认值: False

file_ids.name: file_ids
file_ids.description: The files to be used by the assistant, there can be a maximum of 20 files attached to the assistant
file_ids.natural_language_description: 参数名: Files | 作用: The files to be used by the assistant, there can be a maximum of 20 files attached to the assistant | 提示: Add more files by using the 'Upload a File' operation | 默认值: []

noticeTools.displayName: Connect your own custom n8n tools to this node on the canvas
noticeTools.name: noticeTools
noticeTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connect your own custom n8n tools to this node on the canvas

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: frequency_penalty (值: None) - Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim
maxTokens (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 32,768).

n (值: None) - How many completions to generate for each prompt. Note: Because this parameter generates many completions, it can quickly consume your token quota. Use carefully and ensure that you have reasonable settings for max_tokens and stop.
presence_penalty (值: None) - Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics

temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

topP (值: None) - An alternative to sampling with temperature, controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

reasoning_effort (值: None) - Controls the amount of reasoning tokens to use. A value of "low" will favor speed and economical token usage, "high" will favor more complete reasoning at the cost of more tokens generated and slower responses.
maxToolsIterations (值: None) - The maximum number of tool iteration cycles the LLM will run before stopping. A single iteration can contain multiple tool calls. Set to 0 for no limit.

assistantId.name: assistantId
assistantId.description: Assistant to respond to the message. You can add, modify or remove assistants in the playground.
assistantId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Assistant | 作用: Assistant to respond to the message. You can add, modify or remove assistants in the playground. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters for dall-e-2 and 4000 characters for dall-e-3.
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 作用: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters for dall-e-2 and 4000 characters for dall-e-3.

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input | 默认值: What's in this image?

memory.name: memory
memory.natural_language_description: 参数名: Memory | 默认值: connector
available_options: Use memory connector (值: connector) - Connect one of the supported memory nodes
Use thread ID (值: threadId) - Specify the ID of the thread to continue

threadId.name: threadId
threadId.description: The ID of the thread to continue, a new thread will be created if not specified
threadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Thread ID | 作用: The ID of the thread to continue, a new thread will be created if not specified | 提示: If the thread ID is empty or undefined a new thread will be created and included in the response

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

fileSizeLimitNotice.displayName: OpenAI API limits the size of the audio file to 25 MB
fileSizeLimitNotice.name: fileSizeLimitNotice
fileSizeLimitNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: OpenAI API limits the size of the audio file to 25 MB | 默认值:

model.name: model
model.description: The model to use for image generation
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model to use for image generation | 默认值: dall-e-3

input.name: input
input.description: The input text to classify if it is violates the moderation policy
input.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input | 作用: The input text to classify if it is violates the moderation policy

voice.name: voice
voice.description: The voice to use when generating the audio
voice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Voice | 作用: The voice to use when generating the audio | 默认值: alloy

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the image(s)
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: Name of the binary property which contains the image(s) | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed | 默认值: data

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Type | 默认值: url

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

messages.name: messages
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messages | 默认值: {'values': [{'content': ''}]}

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput
jsonOutput.description: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format. Compatible with GPT-4 Turbo and all GPT-3.5 Turbo models newer than gpt-3.5-turbo-1106.
jsonOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Content as JSON | 作用: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format. Compatible with GPT-4 Turbo and all GPT-3.5 Turbo models newer than gpt-3.5-turbo-1106. | 默认值: False

hideTools.name: hideTools
hideTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: Hide Tools | 默认值: hide
